main_article.main_heading: Microsoft outage: Software bug disrupts aviation in India, several sectors globally
main_article.sub_heading: Faulty update knocks out several Windows computers and servers around the world; IndiGo has cancelled at least 283 trips, and airports around the country saw delays and crowding
